CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The best performance was obtained with the thickness of the active layer of 80-90 nm , the copolymers : PC 70 BM ratio of 1 : 2 ( by weight ) and the Ca / Al used as the cathode.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| active layer with a thickness of 80-90 nm |
| copolymers with PC 70 BM ratio of 1 : 2 ( by weight ) |
| Ca / Al used as the cathode |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| copolymers with PC 70 BM ratio of 1 : 2 ( by weight ) |
| Ca / Al |
